model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I went out and got a pizza, and when I got home Journey ate a whole piece by herself!
That's super unfortunate, How do you get Journey to not eat the food?
Journey can open the fridge, maybe I should put a lock on it. Do you have trouble with your dogs getting into food too?
Well fortunately they can't open the fridge just yet! But yea sometimes they manage to get into other stuff, especially when I leave it out! Does Sid try to get into food also?

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'introduction and work discussion', 'Related Summaries': 'Speaker A and Speaker B discuss their occupations and introduce their pets.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Speaker A: Hey...how are you? ### Speaker B: Hi there. Good. Just chillin watch a movie kinda lol. ### Speaker A: Nice...what do you do for work? ### Speaker B: I work in ac warehouse. Pulling parts. Part time tho. ### Speaker A: Sounds fun....i work at the zoo as a zoo keeper! I love animals!. ### Speaker B: Wow! What is your favorite animal there? ### Speaker A: I'd have to say the white tiger!. ### Speaker B: Neat. Do yall play music for the tigers? Keep em calm. ### Speaker A: Haha no...can't say that we do....do you have any pets at home? ### Speaker B: Bummer. I was gonna suggest green day punk. I have 2 dogs tho. ### Speaker A: What kind of dogs? I have a pet raccoon named journey and a bearded dragon named sid. ### Speaker B: Whoa. My dogs are terriers. What do ya feed a raccoon? Pizza? ### Speaker A: Haha she does like pizza! Anything she can get her little hands on.' }
```
